description: Configuration for custom format groups from TRaSH Guides. Groups with default: true are auto-synced when using guide-backed quality profiles.

skip.description: Trash IDs of CF groups to skip (opt-out of auto-synced default groups).

add.description: CF groups to explicitly add (for non-default groups or groups not auto-matched to your profiles).

items.description: A custom format group from the TRaSH Guides. Groups bundle related custom formats together with recommended settings.

trash_id.description: The trash_id of a custom format group from the TRaSH Guides.

assign_scores_to.description: One or more quality profiles to assign scores to. If omitted, uses all guide-backed profiles.

select.description: Non-default custom formats to additionally include. Required CFs are always included.

exclude.description: Default custom formats to exclude. Required CFs cannot be excluded.
